subject: Email Validation
message: We received your request to join Handler. Please click the link below to validate your email address and join the waitlist. Validate my email

subject: Apologies for the SPAM email
message: Apologies if you received an unusual email from me this morning, it appears that someone gained access to my account this morning. Please DO NOT follow the attachment linked in the email.We are taking the correct measures to prevent this happening again in the future.

subject: Salary Expectation
message: thats better :) 60k is a good salary and Im sure it will give you a great start into Barcelona & Europe. Lets hope for the best.
